body:
Comment 18 by **akalin**: 
Unfortunately, your version seems to repro the hang quite rarely compared to mine.

I combined the versions in #8 to get http://play.golang.org/p/GOq8WP1cxN

Here's an example log for that one with a hang and a SIGQUIT:
